definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: Soon, they fixed my bike and I could ride on again.
sentences.chinese: 很快，他们就修睦了车，我又可以骑了。

sentences.english: Workers will build the new road at the end of this year .
sentences.chinese: 工人们将会在往年年末把这条新的路途修睦。

sentences.english: You can repair your rifle with a big hammer and a swift kick.
sentences.chinese: 你能够用一柄年夜锤和一记飞踢修睦它。

sentences.english: China boasts a good tradition of seeking friendship and living in amity with its neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 中国自古以来就有亲仁善邻，崇信修睦的优良传统。

definition: friendly/amicable/to keep up harmonious relations (with sb)
to regulate the family and rule the state (idiom)
love to all creatures (idiom, from Mencius); universal benevolence
to enlighten/to civilize/to indoctrinate/to train (an animal)
hereditary title bestowed on Confucius' descendants
efficient government, people at peace (idiom); all is well with the state and the people
